mutants.original_line: flat_array = [j for i in layers_sum for x in i[1] for j in x]
mutants.mutated_line: flat_array = [j for i in layers_sum for x in i[2] for j in x]
mutants.code:
def flatten_and_sort_3D_array(array):
    layers_sum = []
    for (i, layer) in enumerate(array):
        layer_sum = sum((j for x in layer for j in x if j >= 0))
        removed_neg_values = [[j for j in x if j >= 0] for x in layer]
        layers_sum.append((layer_sum, removed_neg_values))
    layers_sum.sort()
    flat_array = [j for i in layers_sum for x in i[2] for j in x]
    return flat_array
